channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Expect Misleading Headlines About The Big Beautiful Bill Leaving 10 Million Americans ‘Uninsured’
item.description: The idea that this provision would somehow 'increase the uninsured' seems, if not laughable, at least highly speculative.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Pentagon Terminates Security Clearance Of Russia Collusion Hoaxer Susan Miller
item.description: Susan Miller, a cheerleader for the Russia collusion hoax, 'cannot be trusted with a security clearance,' a senior administration official says.

item.title: Speech And Self-Defense Keep U.S. From Devolving Into Canada And The U.K.
item.description: These countries demonstrate that the greatest defenses against anarcho-tyranny are the rights to free speech and bearing arms.

item.title: Trump orders overturn Biden era antitrust crackdown, promote space industry
item.description: President Trump revoked a Biden-era executive order that spurred more aggressive enforcement of antitrust laws in an effort to promote competition in ...

item.title: Trump Needs To Protect Americans From Surprise Health Care Bills
item.description: In no other field would customers accept businesses failing to tell buyers a price in advance — or attempting to change that price later.

item.title: Democrats Are Lying to Themselves About Why Their Party Is Collapsing
item.description: Democrats now find themselves in an approval death spiral because their strategy invariably emphasizes style over substance.

item.title: What an Acceptable Russia-Ukraine Deal Might Look Like
item.description: The best that can be hoped for is an armistice with an underpinning firm enough to deter Russia from resuming its war when it is ready.

item.title: Putin to test Trump's dealmaking prowess at Alaska summit

item.title: Polanski’s Perfectly Timely J’accuse
item.description: An Officer and a Spy parallels the devastating history of the Dreyfus Affair with lawfare.

item.title: New York Is Grappling with Its Own Kind of Mayhem
item.description: While Trump cracks down on D.C. violence, Gotham is in a similar situation; crime is dropping, but is still too frequent and arbitrary to give residen...

item.title: Jury finds Texas couple guilty of concealing and harboring bakery workers in the U.S. illegally
item.description: Two South Texas bakery owners are guilty of concealing and harboring employees in the U.S. illegally, a jury found Wednesday afternoon following a tri...

item.title: A Tax Law for Manufacturers, but a Trade Policy Against Them
item.description: While the OBBBA tries to buoy manufacturing, President Trump’s tariffs are an anvil dragging the sector down.

item.title: NYC Mayor Eric Adams scrambles to save reelection with boost from Black 'trailblazer' David Paterson

item.title: Judge Declines Trump DOJ Request to Unseal Epstein Grand Jury Testimony
item.description: The Justice Department could appeal the ruling, but doing so would be foolish.
